#summary This is the glossary defining all vocabulary pertaining to this project.

=Glossary=

==Admin==

The highest level of user.  Adds and removes moderators. Has access to source code.

==Comment==

User generated feedback referencing specific projects.

==Moderator==

The middle level of user.  Regulates projects and comments.

==Projects==

All files written and created by RPI hosted on RPH.

==Rating==

User generated number score between 0 and 5 grading specific projects.

==RCSID==

This is an identification given to all members of the RPI community.  It is used on RPH as a username, a user identification, and during user login.

==RPH==

RPI Project Hosting - project name
